explanation: [0-0] On a white platform, candies are placed on a right hand, with ants on each candy. The candies are red, brown, and black. A left hand is using tweezers to pick up a red candy. On the white platform to the left of the left hand, there is a yellow candy with an ant on it.

[0-9] Then the left hand, holding the tweezers, picks up red, green, blue, and brown candies one by one and places them on the white platform. The ants on the candies struggle with their antennae outstretched. Then the left hand picks up a red candy and puts it on the white platform, and then the left hand retracts.
